name: Jump n run Wizard n Lizard
name_original: Jump n run Wizard n Lizard
description:
Small Jump and Run Game made for the April fools Game jam

The goal is to get to the Finish button to proceed to the next level

It has no sound and was made primary to test my self made game engine. Still some bugs around

This is my first Game Jam experience

Contols:

Escape to Quit

G To Toggle fullscreen

W / Space to Jump

A and D to move

The engine was developed outside the game jam

Engine Source: https://github.com/LeoBesimo/EquinoxEngine

Game Source: https://github.com/LeoBesimo/April-Fool-Game-Jam
